PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1993-09081993-05-040,  EA,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing John Drajewicz, Gary Halpin or Paul Reynaud, Head, Deputy Head and member, respectively, of the Canadian Delegation to the XVth CONGRESS of the POSTAL UNION OF THE AMERICAS, SPAIN AND PORTUGAL to sign the following documents: 1. its Constitution, 2. any additional Protocol to the Constitution, 3. the Regulations of the International Office, 4. the Final Protocol and Detailed Regulations, and any subsidiary Agreement opened for signature at the Congress which will take place in Montevideo, Uruguay, on June 23, 1993.
Attachments
